entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who sent a Mark into the sky last summer and is also referred to as 'my Lord' by Malfoy. He is described as being merciful.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as having disappointed Voldemort and is referred to as 'Lu-cius'. He stops talking abruptly when Voldemort speaks.

entities.name: lestranges
entities.description: The Lestranges are mentioned as being entombed in Azkaban for their faithfulness to Voldemort. They are described as having gone to Azkaban rather than renounce him.

relationships.description: Voldemort is disappointed in Malfoy for not being faithful.
Voldemort appreciates the Lestranges for their faithfulness and loyalty.
